product_name: Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle - 3-Piece
long_description: Combining excellent performance at an introductory price, the 3-piece Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle gets the whole family out on the water with a smile, and offers compact storage for travel. Suitable for multiple paddlers of different heights, the Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle telescopes to fit 3 size ranges: 70 - 77.5 in, 74 - 81.5 in and 80 - 87.5 in. Warm to the touch, even on cool mornings, a full fiberglass shaft helps keep weight to a minimum. Built with a lightweight and durable fiberglass-reinforced nylon blade, the Werner Fiji can take whatever you can throw at it. You can paddle all day without needing to be an expert thanks to the teardrop shape that provides an immediate, powerful stroke. The perfect amount of flex in the shaft and blade keeps up performance without fatiguing the body. Palm grip design gives maximum blade control while perfecting the forward stroke and bracing strokes. 3-piece design breaks down to make transport easy.
short_description: Combining excellent performance at an introductory price, the 3-piece Werner Fiji Adjustable Stand Up Paddle gets the whole family out on the water with a smile, and offers compact storage for travel.
